Detailed Description

Keeps the attribute and methods for doing calibration.

bool Calibration::executeCalibration ( int *  _mode,
cv::Mat *  _view,
int *  _frameElapsed 
)

This method executing the operation of calibration. Note that is necessary more then one interation for end calibration. Probably you will need to call this methods several time.

Parameters:
[out] _mode Receive the current mode, and update the value.
[out] _view Reference to frame.
[out] _frameElapsed Total of frame computed by calibration.

Here is the call graph for this function:

bool Calibration::runCalibration ( vector< cv::Mat > &  _rotationVector,
vector< cv::Mat > &  _translationVector,
vector< float > &  _reprojErrs,
double &  _totalAvgErr 
) [inline, protected]

Run calibration and fill the parameters.

Parameters:
_rotationVector Matrix with rotation parameters.
_translationVector Matrix with translation parameters.
_reprojErrs Receive reprojection error.
_totalAvgErr Average of error.
Returns:
If the range of matrix all right, return true.
